author.name: Licensed by Woolworths - ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: A popular way to enjoy the jumbo prawns is to thread them onto skewers and grill them quickly over charcoal.
name: Prawn Kebabs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 lemons, 2 lemon juice only, 1 cut into wedges
1 green capsicum, cut into bite-sized squares

recipeInstructions.text: Shell the prawns down to the tail, leaving a little bit of shell at the end. Remove the veins and discard. Mix together the lemon juice, garlic, cumin, paprika, and a little salt and rub over the prawns. Leave the prawns to marinate for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, prepare the charcoal grill. Thread the prawns onto metal skewers, alternating with the tomatoes and green capsicum pieces, until all the ingredients are used up.

Place the kebabs on an oiled rack over the glowing coals and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, basting with any of the leftover marinade, until the prawns are tender and the tomatoes and capsicums are lightly browned. Serve immediately with lemon wedges.
